title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 103.10 - Argument
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 103.10 - Argument

State Regulations

All parties shall be afforded an opportunity to present
written argument on issues of law, and an opportunity to present oral evidence
on issues of fact. Oral arguments shall be at the discretion of the hearing
officer. All arguments shall be included in the stenographic record of the
hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
103.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
